name: Stellar Storm
description:
Lukenaud Stilyes is in charge of a pirate spaceship. His purpose : to be the richest of the galaxy. That was until the imperial police forces started to want him dead after he stole a ship from them. Furthermore, his rivals won’t be against eliminating the concurrence.

How long will he be able to survive?

Stellar Storm is a Shoot them up / Management game developped for the Ludum Dare 41.
